mapper.select: SELECT tb1.id,tb1.content,tb1.createTime,tb1.likeCount,tb2.name,tb2.icon FROM manga_comment tb1 LEFT JOIN manga_user tb2 ON tb1.uid = tb2.id WHERE tb1.mid = #{mid} AND tb1.isDelete = #{isDelete} ORDER BY tb1.createTime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE manga_comment SET isDelete = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
